entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
